Module net.finmath.lib
Package net.finmath.integration

Class RombergRealIntegration

java.lang.Object
net.finmath.integration.AbstractRealIntegral
net.finmath.integration.RombergRealIntegration
All Implemented Interfaces:
RealIntegral
public class RombergRealIntegration extends AbstractRealIntegral
Implements a Romberg integrator. The class is actually a wrapper to the Romberg integrator in commons-math.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Christian Fries

      Parameters:
      lowerBound - Lower bound of the integral.
